user.description:
Select appropriate connection method.

For cloud (E-mail) configurations both cloud and local control are available.

email.description:
Enter your username (E-mail address) and password for the Turkov smartphone application.

To register and add devices:
- on Android: [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.llcturkov.turkov&hl=ru&pli=1), [APKPure](https://apkpure.com/turkov/com.llcturkov.turkov/download)
- on iOS: [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/ru/app/turkov/id1464927777)

cloud_host.description:
Provide a hostname or IP Address to connect to Turkov {device__type} {device__name} (S/N: `{device__serial_number}`) locally.

To skip this device, leave the `Host` field blank.

host.description: Provide a hostname or IP Address to connect to Turkov device locally.
